siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.excerpt: Yes . While the variable is holding the value of any cell from the parsed output, you can assign several variables to the same cell and both will have the sameâ€¦
markdownRemark.html: Yes. While the variable is holding the value of any cell from the parsed output, you can assign several variables to the same cell and both will have the same value.
